title: Stardew Valley: How to Catch a Tiger Trout + All Uses

steps.title: Tiger Trout can be found in rivers from 6 AM to 7 PM in Fall and Winter.
steps.content: Tiger Trout can be found in rivers from 6 AM to 7 PM in Fall and Winter. This includes rivers found in Pelican Town, the Cindersap Forest, Riverlands Farms, Forest Farms, Meadowlands Farms, and Hill-Top Farms. The Tiger Trout has a dart-like movement, so be prepared to move your fishing bar to match its erratic pace. [1] X Research source Keep in mind that you must use a rod other than the Training Rod; otherwise, you'll only be able to catch basic fish. If you're unable to fish , you may also find Tiger Trout at the Traveling Cart, Krobus' shop on Wednesdays, or gifted by a pet cat with max friendship. You can purchase Magic Bait from Qi to catch Tiger Trout in any weather, time, and season.

steps.title: Tiger Trout is needed for the River Fish Bundle.
steps.content: Tiger Trout is needed for the River Fish Bundle. This Community Center bundle contributes to the repair of the Fish Tank.

steps.title: Use Tiger Trout to make recipes.
steps.content: Use Tiger Trout to make recipes. You can cook a total of three recipes with Tiger Trout, though any fish will work: Maki Roll Quality Fertilizer Sashimi

steps.title: Tiger Trout can be gifted.
steps.content: Tiger Trout can be gifted. This works as a liked gift for Willy or neutral gifts for Demetrius, Elliott, Leo, Linus, Pam, and Sebastian.

steps.title: You can use Tiger Trout to make a Fish Shirt.
steps.content: You can use Tiger Trout to make a Fish Shirt. You can use the Sewing Machine in Emily's and Haley's house along with some Cloth . Tiger Trout can also be used as an orange dye.

steps.title: Tiger Trout can be placed in a Fish Pond.
steps.content: Tiger Trout can be placed in a Fish Pond. The only output from this pond is dark brown Tiger Trout Roe. Unlike other fish, Tiger Trout can't reproduce, so you'll need to catch and add all 10 fish to the pond.

steps.title: Tiger Trout is used in a few quests.
steps.content: Tiger Trout is used in a few quests. During Fall or Winter, Willy will randomly ask for 1-4 Tiger Trout at the "Help Wanted" board outside of Pierre's store. Demetrius may also request 10 Tiger Trout via the Special Orders board near the Lewis' house.
